levels.description:
Gains <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> ATK, and the effect of this unit's Talent 1 increases to <@ba.vup>{talent_scale}</> times; once per skill activation, can prevent an Operator within Attack Range from receiving lethal damage, preventing their HP from falling below <@ba.vup>1</> for <@ba.vup>{grave_duration}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Can be used up to {skill_max_trigger_time} times within the same battle (can manually deactivate skill)</>
